responses: Hello! Welcome to the College Helpdesk. How can I assist you today?
Hi there! I'm here to help with your college-related queries.
Greetings! How may I help you with college information?
Goodbye! Feel free to come back if you have more questions.
Take care! Have a great day ahead.
Bye! Don't hesitate to ask if you need any help later.
You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help with?
Happy to help! Let me know if you have more questions.
Glad I could assist! Feel free to ask anything else.

To apply for admission:
1. Visit our college website
2. Fill out the online application form
3. Upload required documents (10th & 12th marksheets, ID proof)
4. Pay the application fee
5. Appear for the entrance test/interview if applicable

For more details, visit the Admissions Office or call: 1800-XXX-XXXX

Admission Schedule:
- Application Start: June 1st
- Application Deadline: July 31st
- Entrance Test: August 10th
- Results: August 20th
- Counseling: August 25th - September 5th

Please check the official website for the latest updates.

We offer the following programs:

**Undergraduate (UG):**
- B.Tech (CSE, ECE, ME, CE, EEE)
- BBA, BCA, B.Com, B.Sc

**Postgraduate (PG):**
- M.Tech, MBA, MCA, M.Sc

**Diploma Courses:**
- Computer Science, Mechanical, Electrical

For detailed curriculum, visit the Academics section on our website.

Fee Structure (Per Year):

**B.Tech Programs:** ₹85,000 - ₹1,20,000
**BBA/BCA/B.Com:** ₹45,000 - ₹60,000
**M.Tech/MBA:** ₹1,00,000 - ₹1,50,000
**Hostel Fee:** ₹50,000 - ₹70,000

Note: Fees may vary by specialization. Scholarships available for meritorious students. Contact the Fee Section for exact amounts.

Scholarship Programs Available:

1. **Merit Scholarship:** Up to 50% fee waiver for top performers
2. **SC/ST Scholarship:** Government-funded assistance
3. **Sports Scholarship:** For state/national level athletes
4. **Need-based Aid:** For economically weaker sections

Eligibility: Minimum 75% in qualifying exam
Application: Submit scholarship form with documents to the Scholarship Cell.

College Timings:

**Classes:** 9:00 AM - 4:30 PM (Monday to Friday)
**Saturday:** 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM (Labs/Extra classes)
**Office Hours:** 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM
**Library:** 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM

Note: Timings may vary during exams and holidays.

CLASS TIMETABLE (Updated: February 2026)

**PERIOD TIMINGS:**
- Period 1: 9:00 AM - 9:50 AM
- Period 2: 9:50 AM - 10:40 AM
- Break: 10:40 AM - 11:00 AM
- Period 3: 11:00 AM - 11:50 AM
- Period 4: 11:50 AM - 12:40 PM
- Lunch: 12:40 PM - 1:30 PM
- Period 5: 1:30 PM - 2:20 PM
- Period 6: 2:20 PM - 3:10 PM
- Period 7: 3:10 PM - 4:00 PM

**B.TECH CSE (3rd Year - Section A):**
- Monday: DBMS (Room 301), OS (Room 302), Lab (Lab 1)
- Tuesday: CN (Room 303), SE (Room 301), DBMS (Room 301)
- Wednesday: OS Lab (Lab 2), CN (Room 303), SE (Room 302)
- Thursday: DBMS (Room 301), CN (Room 303), OS (Room 302)
- Friday: SE (Room 301), Mini Project (Lab 1), Library

For other departments, please check the notice board or student portal.

ROOM & BUILDING DIRECTORY (Updated: February 2026)

**MAIN ACADEMIC BLOCK:**
- Ground Floor: Room 101-110 (1st Year Classes)
- 1st Floor: Room 201-210 (2nd Year Classes)
- 2nd Floor: Room 301-310 (3rd Year Classes)
- 3rd Floor: Room 401-410 (4th Year & PG Classes)

**LABORATORY BLOCK:**
- Lab 1: Computer Lab (Ground Floor)
- Lab 2: Operating Systems Lab (1st Floor)
- Lab 3: Networking Lab (1st Floor)
- Lab 4: Electronics Lab (2nd Floor)
- Lab 5: Physics Lab (2nd Floor)
- Lab 6: Chemistry Lab (Ground Floor)

**SPECIAL ROOMS:**
- Seminar Hall 1: Main Block, 2nd Floor
- Seminar Hall 2: Library Building, 1st Floor
- Auditorium: Separate Building (500 capacity)
- HOD Cabins: Respective Department Floors
- Administrative Office: Main Block, Ground Floor

**QUICK REFERENCE:**
- Room 301: DBMS, SE Classes
- Room 302: OS Classes
- Room 303: Computer Networks
- Room 304: Data Structures
- Room 305: Software Engineering

Contact Information:

**Address:** 123 College Road, City Name, State - 500001
**Phone:** +91-XXXX-XXXXXX
**Email:** info@abccollege.edu.in
**Website:** www.abccollege.edu.in

**Quick Contacts:**
- Admissions: admissions@abccollege.edu.in
- Exams: exams@abccollege.edu.in
- Placements: placements@abccollege.edu.in

Hostel Facilities:

**Boys Hostel:** 3 blocks, 500+ capacity
**Girls Hostel:** 2 blocks, 300+ capacity

**Amenities:**
- Wi-Fi enabled
- 24/7 security
- Mess facility
- Common room with TV
- Laundry service

**Fee:** ₹50,000 - ₹70,000 per year

To apply, submit hostel application with admission form.

Placement Highlights:

**Placement Rate:** 85%+ for eligible students
**Highest Package:** ₹24 LPA
**Average Package:** ₹5.5 LPA

**Top Recruiters:**
TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Cognizant, Accenture, Amazon, Microsoft, Deloitte

**Placement Cell Contact:** placements@abccollege.edu.in

Training programs and mock interviews conducted for students.

Library Facilities:

**Timings:** 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM (All days)
**Collection:** 50,000+ books, journals, magazines

**Services:**
- Book lending (max 3 books for 14 days)
- Digital library with e-books
- Online journals access
- Reading halls
- Photocopying service

**To get Library Card:** Submit passport photo and ID to library desk.

Examination Schedule:

**Internal Exams:** 2 per semester (Mid-term & Pre-final)
**Semester End Exams:** December (Odd Sem), May (Even Sem)

**Exam Pattern:**
- Internal Assessment: 30 marks
- External Exam: 70 marks

Detailed timetable is published 2 weeks before exams on the notice board and website.

Faculty Information:

**Total Faculty:** 150+ experienced professors
**PhD Holders:** 60%
**Industry Experienced:** 40%

Each department has qualified HODs and assistant professors. Faculty details are available on the college website under 'Faculty' section.

For specific faculty queries, contact the respective department office.

Transport Facility:

**College Buses:** 15+ buses covering major areas
**Bus Fee:** ₹15,000 - ₹25,000 per year (based on distance)

**Bus Timings:**
- Morning Pickup: 7:30 AM onwards
- Evening Drop: 5:00 PM

**Routes Available:** City center, Railway station, Major residential areas

Contact Transport Office for route details and registration.

Attendance Policy:

**Minimum Required:** 75% attendance in each subject
**Condonation:** Up to 10% can be condoned for medical reasons

**Below 65%:** Not eligible to appear for exams
**65-74%:** Condonation fee applicable

**Note:** Attendance is tracked biometrically. Check your attendance on the student portal regularly.

College Events:

**Annual Technical Fest:** TechnoVista (February)
**Cultural Fest:** Rhythm (March)
**Sports Meet:** Annual Sports Day (January)
**Workshops:** Monthly technical workshops

**Clubs & Activities:**
- Coding Club
- Robotics Club
- Music & Dance Club
- NSS & NCC

Follow our social media pages for event updates!

Certificate Requests:

**Available Certificates:**
- Bonafide Certificate
- Transfer Certificate (TC)
- Character Certificate
- Study Certificate
- Course Completion Certificate

**Process:**
1. Apply online through student portal OR
2. Submit application at Administrative Office
3. Processing time: 2-3 working days
4. Collect with valid ID proof

**Fee:** ₹50 - ₹200 depending on certificate type

Student Portal Access:

**URL:** portal.abccollege.edu.in
**Login ID:** Your enrollment number
**Default Password:** DOB (DDMMYYYY format)

**Portal Features:**
- View attendance
- Check results
- Fee payment
- Course registration
- Download study materials

**Forgot Password?** Click 'Forgot Password' or contact IT Help Desk.

Campus Wi-Fi:

**Network Name:** ABC-Campus-WiFi
**Access:** Use your student portal credentials

**Coverage:** All academic blocks, library, hostels
**Speed:** Up to 50 Mbps

**Note:** Social media sites may be restricted during class hours. For connectivity issues, contact IT Help Desk at Block A, Ground Floor.

Canteen & Food Facilities:

**Main Canteen:** Near Admin Block
**Timings:** 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM

**Available:**
- Breakfast, Lunch, Snacks
- South Indian, North Indian, Chinese options
- Vegetarian & Non-vegetarian

**Hostel Mess:** Separate timing for hostel students

**Food Court:** Multiple vendors near sports ground

Sports Facilities:

**Outdoor:**
- Cricket ground
- Football field
- Basketball court
- Tennis court
- Athletic track

**Indoor:**
- Badminton courts
- Table tennis
- Chess room
- Gym facility

**Sports Officer:** Mr. Rajesh (Sports Block)
**Timings:** 6:00 AM - 7:00 PM

Annual sports meet and inter-college tournaments conducted.

Anti-Ragging Policy:

**Ragging is strictly prohibited and punishable!**

**Helpline:** 1800-XXX-XXXX (24x7)
**Email:** antiragging@abccollege.edu.in

**Complaint Options:**
- Anti-Ragging Committee (Admin Block)
- Online complaint portal
- Anonymous complaint box

**Punishment:** Suspension to expulsion based on severity

Don't hesitate to report. Your identity will be protected.

Documents Required for Admission:

**Mandatory:**
1. 10th & 12th Marksheets (Original + 2 copies)
2. Transfer Certificate
3. Migration Certificate (if applicable)
4. Passport size photos (6 nos)
5. Aadhar Card copy
6. Caste Certificate (if applicable)

**Additional:**
- Income Certificate (for scholarships)
- Entrance exam scorecard
- Gap Certificate (if applicable)

Bring originals for verification.
